Package org.moddingx.libx.base.tile

Class BlockBE<T extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity>

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour
net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block
org.moddingx.libx.base.BlockBase
org.moddingx.libx.base.tile.BlockBE<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.world.flag.FeatureElement, net.minecraft.world.level.block.EntityBlock, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, Registerable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MenuBlockBE
public class BlockBE<T extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity> extends BlockBase implements net.minecraft.world.level.block.EntityBlock
Base class for blocks with block entities for mods using ModXRegistration. This will automatically set the creative tab if it's defined in the mod and register a block item and a block entity type. The constructor requires a BlockEntity class. The block entity class must define a public constructor with three arguments of types BlockEntityType, BlockPos and BlockState for this to create a block entity type. This class will do the magic to wire the block entity to the block and invoke the constructor. The block entity class can implement TickingBlock and GameEventBlock. This class will then generate a matching BlockEntityTicker and a GameEventListener if required.

    • shouldDropInventory

      protected boolean shouldDropInventory(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state)
      Override this to prevent the inventory of the block entity to be dropped when the block is broken. To automatically drop the inventory the block entity must provide an item handler capability that is an instance of IItemHandlerModifiable
